alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Shelby County through 115 PM CDT... At 1230 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shelby County Airport, or near Alabaster, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Calera, Chelsea, Montevallo, Columbiana, Wilsonville, Vincent, Harpersville, Westover, Wilton, American Village, Maylene, University Of Montevallo, Shelby County Airport, Camp Branch, Siluria, Alabaster Veterans Park and Gaston Steam Plant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
